segments.text: Ugh, the sink's overflowing with dirty water spilling out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinet doors, what a gross mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, her shoe must be wet now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even flinch, just keeps drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's turning into a slippery puddle of yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on a shaky stool, hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water could make everything worse if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching too, like it's all fine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen's becoming filthy and chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The nice garden outside just highlights the indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such avoidable filth everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR
